3: A Corrupted tries to sneak up on you from behind, but Vera nails it to the metal wall of the boat with her banner spear before it can touch you.
Having made sure that it is no longer moving, she kicks it off the boat.
Some of them are not mechanoids native to the city.
That's strange. If that's the case, where the hell did the Corrupted we've encountered come from?
Swarms of Corrupted are approaching the city, surrounding it orderly.
Just the sight of it is enough to make one shiver.
